creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: (Died on April 8, Tenpō 7, at the age of 41, buried Nichren sest Jōshinji Temple, Fukagawa); posthumous name: {Shinsōin baiga nissō shinji}; Farewell poem

title: Memorial Portrait of Iwai Hanshirō VI
